analysis.description: FreezableToken.toKey (/unique_chucks/8/0xafe8ba38ec668db1d30c805c40983839bf8b4278.sol#330-339) is declared view but contains assembly code

FreezableToken.releaseOnce (/unique_chucks/8/0xafe8ba38ec668db1d30c805c40983839bf8b4278.sol#294-318) uses timestamp for comparisons
	Dangerous comparisons:
	- require(bool)(uint64(block.timestamp) > head) (/unique_chucks/8/0xafe8ba38ec668db1d30c805c40983839bf8b4278.sol#300)

FreezableToken.releaseAll (/unique_chucks/8/0xafe8ba38ec668db1d30c805c40983839bf8b4278.sol#318-328) uses timestamp for comparisons
	Dangerous comparisons:
	- release != 0 && block.timestamp > release (/unique_chucks/8/0xafe8ba38ec668db1d30c805c40983839bf8b4278.sol#323-327)

FreezableToken.freeze (/unique_chucks/8/0xafe8ba38ec668db1d30c805c40983839bf8b4278.sol#341-376) uses timestamp for comparisons
	Dangerous comparisons:
	- require(bool)(_until > block.timestamp) (/unique_chucks/8/0xafe8ba38ec668db1d30c805c40983839bf8b4278.sol#342-344)
